analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol#439-440)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
toToken in BancorQuickConverter.convertFor (/unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol#516) is a local variable never initialiazed

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- converter = ITokenConverter(smartToken.owner()) (/unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol#525-528)

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(fromToken,toToken,_amount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol#536-540)

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(fromToken,toToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol#536-540)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/45/0x5ed2f6230364ff1ef2b83b3f66037fb1d349e842.sol#1): it allows old versions
